images.copyright: Sipapu Bridge in Natural Bridges National Monument, Utah, USA (© Fyletto/Getty Images)
images.title: Bridges to the past
images.caption: Bridges to the past
images.desc: The story of this sandstone formation in the US state Utah's Natural Bridges National Monument begins around 10 million years ago. That's when tectonic shifts began slowly lifting the 200,000 square-kilometre Colorado Plateau above the surrounding plains. In ensuing eons, the Colorado River's many streams eroded the elevated land, threading it with deep canyons. When water broke through one canyon wall into another canyon, sometimes a natural bridge like this one remained above the breach.

tooltips.walle: આ છબી વૉલપેપર તરીકે ડાઉનલોડ કરવા માટે ઉપલબ્ધ નથી.
tooltips.walls: આ ઇમેજ ડાઉનલોડ કરો. આ ઇમેજનો ઉપયોગ ફક્ત વૉલપેપર સુધી મર્યાદિત છે.
